titles.title: How Great Is Our God! How Great Is His Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How great is our God! How great is His Name!
He's the wonderful One, forever the same
He rolled back the waters of the mighty Red Sea.
And He said, I will lead you, put your trust in Me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How great is our God! How great is our Lord!
He's perfecting His Church, He's given His Word.
He's revealing His treasures to those who will see.
And He said, I will give you anointed ministry.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How great is our God! How great is His Name!
The great Jehovah I Am, forever the same.
To the praise of His Glory, we shall ever proclaim
The excellent greatness of His Holy Name.
